name: Tint's Rave Demo
description:
Tint's Rave is my first ever game that I decided to put online. You're a cube that destroys colors to get to the next levels! The product is currently in development and the following demo isn't even close to what you will see in the final game.
if you want to post a feedback then the comment section is the way to go.

I'm looking for a music producer for this game!
Contact: blazer2#7449

And yes...
I know about glitchy colliders, I do know!
